name: Vaadin.TabElement

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: If true, the item is in selected state.

properties.name: value
properties.description: A property representing the value of this item

description:
`<vaadin-tab>` is a Polymer 2 element providing an accessible and customizable tab.

[Generic styling/theming documentation](https://cdn.vaadin.com/vaadin-valo-theme/0.3.1/demo/customization.html)

```
  <vaadin-tab>
    Tab 1
  </vaadin-tab>
```

The following state attributes are available for styling:

Attribute  | Description | Part name
-----------|-------------|------------
`disabled` | Set to a disabled tab | :host
`focused` | Set when the element is focused | :host
`focus-ring` | Set when the element is keyboard focused | :host
`selected` | Set when the tab is selected | :host
`active` | Set when mousedown or enter/spacebar pressed | :host
`orientation` | Set to `horizontal` or `vertical` dependinng on the direction of items  | :host
